MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD8 postcode area of Jedburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:00pm due to a faulty insulator on our overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:55pm on Friday, 05 February 2021
